note: Indoor air quality at my kids' school is all I care about. Used to care about usual things like data engineering in Rust or flying helicopters. Now, to avoid sick breathers we explore public lands in our Land Cruiser (100) and the city on our our bikes (4 yo included). I fix my cars (e61, e92) for exercise. I also refuse to buy the enshittified IoT appliances they sell now. MS computer science. Eugene, Oregon (having lived everywhere else).
